title: Ticket #2399: Make hold=true work properly when spooling job files
description: Tickets #1005 and #2398 describe the problems that occur when you set hold=true in your submit file and use the -spool or -remote option to condor_submit. The fix for 7.6.3 was to disallow this combination, as a proper fix was deemed too invasive for a stable release. In the development series, we should consider a proper fix that allows these options to work together properly.
creator: jfrey
